events.name: canCallMenu
events.comment: Can the player call the main menu?

events.name: areYouSureMenu
events.comment: Is "Are you sure" menu being displayed?

events.name: mainMenu
events.comment: Is the main menu being displayed?

events.name: currLevel
events.comment: Level the player is currently on.

events.name: quickMenuMode
events.comment: Quickly go to the main menu, skipping the title screen

events.name: soundVolume
events.comment: How loud souds will play at their maximum level

children.text: Set text and add offsets to the textbox in order to generate an arc.

children.functionDescription: Set text and add offsets to the textbox in order to generate an arc

functionParameters.name: text
functionParameters.comment: Text to write formatted as an arc

children.name: interval
children.comment: Interval to increment i according to the length of the text

children.text: Set text.
Check if local storage items already exist.
Load those that exist.
BGM saved data missing means it's the first time the player has opened the game, therefore play the menu music.
Call main menu elements.
Make flies go up, then back down, but this time with the level selection frame.
Set transition door blur level according to "ChangeBGBlur" tween.
Set buttons as enabled or disabled depending on the current level.

children.functionDescription: Set buttons as enabled or disabled depending on the current level

children.text: Level unavailable.
Level available
Setup level buttons.
On button pressed (generic).
On button pressed (levels) - go to selected level.

actions.text: Player is loading a level from the menu, therefore the menu transition should be used.
Remove the blur from the transition door.

children.text: On button pressed (reset) - call "are you sure" screen. Set focus to "Not Sure" button.

actions.text: Move button selector to the new menu.

children.text: On button pressed (reset sure) - reset saved game data.

actions.text: Update level button states to reflect the reset.
Set local storage currLevel item accordingly.
Move button selector back to the default menu.

children.text: On button pressed (reset not sure) - hid "are you sure" screen.

actions.text: Move button selector back to the default menu.

children.text: On button pressed (SFX) - toggle SFX.
On button pressed (BGM) - toggle BGM.
Move button selector to selected button.

children.functionDescription: Move button selector to selected button

children.text: Start invisible.
Set button selector position to the currently selected button.
Select button to press.
Special case for when the "Are you sure" menu is open.
Normal case.
Play animation.
When player presses a button, change its animation to pressed.
When player releases a pressed button, return to normal state and execute corresponding action.
If the player presses a button, then moves the cursor away from that button, do not run the action.
Enter and Space act like confirmation buttons.
Close "Are you sure" menu, if it's opened and reset button selector focus.
Request motion controls.
Make the eyes of the frog follow the player's touch.

parameters.x: lerp(Self.X, TitleFrog.ImagePointX(Self.whichEye) + cos(angle(Self.X, Self.Y, Touch.X, Touch.Y)) * distance(Self.X, Self.Y, Touch.X, Touch.Y) * 0.055, 10 * dt)
parameters.y: lerp(Self.Y, TitleFrog.ImagePointY(Self.whichEye) + sin(angle(Self.X, Self.Y, Touch.X, Touch.Y)) * distance(Self.X, Self.Y, Touch.X, Touch.Y) * 0.055, 10 * dt)

children.text: Make the eyes of the frog follow the player's mouse pointer or the button selector.
Follow the button selector.

parameters.x: lerp(Self.X, TitleFrog.ImagePointX(Self.whichEye) + cos(angle(Self.X, Self.Y, ButtonSelector.X, ButtonSelector.Y)) * distance(Self.X, Self.Y, ButtonSelector.X, ButtonSelector.Y) * 0.075, 10 * dt)
parameters.y: lerp(Self.Y, TitleFrog.ImagePointY(Self.whichEye) + sin(angle(Self.X, Self.Y, ButtonSelector.X, ButtonSelector.Y)) * distance(Self.X, Self.Y, ButtonSelector.X, ButtonSelector.Y) * 0.075, 10 * dt)

children.text: Follow the mouse pointer.

parameters.x: lerp(Self.X, TitleFrog.ImagePointX(Self.whichEye) + cos(angle(Self.X, Self.Y, Mouse.X, Mouse.Y)) * distance(Self.X, Self.Y, Mouse.X, Mouse.Y) * 0.055, 10 * dt)
parameters.y: lerp(Self.Y, TitleFrog.ImagePointY(Self.whichEye) + sin(angle(Self.X, Self.Y, Mouse.X, Mouse.Y)) * distance(Self.X, Self.Y, Mouse.X, Mouse.Y) * 0.055, 10 * dt)

children.text: Make the frog blink periodically
When the player touches an eye, make it blink.
Update mouse position every frame.
If the player hovers a button, update ButtonSelector position.
Update old mouse coordinates.
Play title screen animation.
Skip to main menu.

actions.text: Show frog and call main menu.

children.text: Show title screen first.
Set interact text according to the user's platform.
